mapper.select: SELECT id, type, title, content, date, restaurant_id as restaurantId, is_active as isActive, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM restaurant_news WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND is_active = true ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, type, title, content, date, restaurant_id as restaurantId, is_active as isActive, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM restaurant_news WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant_news ( type, title, content, date, restaurant_id, is_active, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{restaurantId}, true, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant_news SET type = #{type}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date = #{date}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
